data.event: It was formed when Tennessee County, North Carolina, was split in 1796, when Tennessee became a state, to reduce confusion.

event.title: reduced the county to its current size and boundaries by 1871

data.event: Later acts of the Tennessee General Assembly further reduced the county to its current size and boundaries by 1871.

event.title: were probably mined during the War of 1812

data.event: Both were probably mined during the War of 1812.

event.title: captured this part of Tennessee in early 1862

data.event: Little mining is likely to have happened here during the Civil War, since the Union Army captured this part of Tennessee in early 1862.
